post.body: Did you give up on your iPhone? Which BB are you using?
you look very serious from across the room. btw congrats on the win
Does that office space come with funding as well?
Here is the last "stevenote" for all the Macworld attendees http://bit.ly/IxwD
I think UR right. That's probably the inside joke now at the SS. They'll be like "Oh man did you look at his face as he ducked".
In response to your last Q - "disrupts life"
interesting - The original saying went like this "... when pigs fly...." - Now I wonder what's in store "When Pigs Pray".....
Surprised - I am betting that we'll be seeing $1.00 gas soon. & OPEC can't do Zilch about it.
Soon location tracking sites will sell CO2 Emission data to 3rd party service providers & hence 've a Rev stream for their Biz Model
listening to a pitch by company "listen to you" - I hope I heard that right cuz I can't find their website
Blagojevich gets ready to tell his side of story - Wants Press to show up with money and to leave shoes at the door http://bit.ly/QyXf
"Ipod Tax" Whoa, The Empire State to tax downloaded music http://bit.ly/MQpf Now we'll have NY'ers come into Jersey to download music
Its' official - Secret Service confirms that they will take a Bullet any day, but they will not take a shoe or two.
He "Bernie Made-off with a lot of other people's money" - Madoff even advised the Govt on protecting investors from scams http://bit.ly/V6QP
First there was "poke" Now "You've been served" Australia OK's FB for legal notifications. The perils of online presence http://bit.ly/G2fT
Just when you think U 've seen the it all, Madoff emerges. How the heck do U lose $50B & fly under the radar for so long? http://bit.ly/afhf
"Best brand of Soap to wash mouth with" is what Sean Avery is wondering after his "sloppy seconds" remark got him fired http://bit.ly/4lUp
Wow that was one irate Iraqi reporter - But I keep looking at replays of the shoes he hurled & think that he can actually pitch for MLB
Craig Hockenberry of Iconfactory blogs direct to Steve Jobs "App store pricing hindering quality app development" http://tinyurl.com/58qmqo
"Madoff fallout widens & ensnares more" I doubt that one person can hide a $50 billion Ponzi scheme for so long http://tinyurl.com/6mvyxj
Sunday morning random thought. "We should be putting the Blog-oy-uh-Vich to head up Accounts Receivables"
Did the SEC focus on celebrity types like Martha Stewart (for avoiding losses of $45,673) while completely ignoring Madoff ($ 50 Billion)
I once experienced COLD like this in Montreal. All I can say is its COLDER today.
With the number of charities (educational, social etc..) shut down by the Madoff Scam - He Bernie Madoff is the epitome of all evils
With my fabulous family at the Cirque du Soleil - Wintuk.
at Devi (18th st) for dinner. Nice place. Great decor. Awesome wine list and belgian beers to boot. ummmm....
